title: SRK Found Himself Ugly, Bigg Boss Nominates All Housemates & More From Entertainment
text:
Twitter

Today, on Soni Razdan's birthday, Alia Bhatt wished her with an extremely adorable throwback picture from her childhood days and we are all for it

Twitter

Some of the things that you don’t think about will happen to you and they are the best things of life. You just don’t know it yet. I don’t want to show off but I’m genuinely a dream come true. I’m a lower middle class boy without his parents bound to the city of glamour and become a movie star. The world has showered me with their love. This happens in only dreams but I never thought of it. I haven’t believed it, I am still that Delhi boy,” Shah Rukh said.

Twitter

Don't Miss 395 SHARES 153 SHARES 428 SHARES 112 SHARES

It’s everyone's guilty pleasure and the show gets dramatic and obnoxious to an extent that you just want to grab a tub of popcorn and enjoy it! This year, the show is again being talked about, thanks to personal relationships of contestants.

Twitter

Taking a break from his hectic schedule, Virat Kohli is in a holiday mood and it's evident from his latest picture with wife Anushka Sharma. Perched on top of the Test Championship standings after pocketing a commanding 3-0 series whitewash of South Africa, Virat Kohli posted a picture with actress-wife Anushka Sharma from a picturesque location.

Twitter

There is everything inspirational about him. Akshay Kumar is one actor who takes his fitness to another level and is admired by the world. And this time again he proved why fitness is extremely prominent in his life. The actor who has had hectic schedule is under the weather but despite being unwell he attended the 11th Akshay Kumar International Kudo tournament in Surat, Gujarat to motivate the kids out there.
